about_the_game:
This soundtrack for There's Always a Madman: Do Your Worst includes two tracks: the game's title track "Better Do Your Worst" with lyrics, which can be heard on the game's title screen, and an instrumental version of that same song.

1. The title track "Better Do Your Worst" containing lyrics that plays on the title screen

2. An instrumental version of the title track "Better Do Your Worst"

Note that this only contains these two tracks from the game. It is not a complete soundtrack of all music in the game. This is the only music from the game for sale.

content_descriptors.notes: The lyrics for the song "Do Your Worst" are about a madman who does his worst and how the secret agent going up against him will have to do their worst as well, which may include killing the madman.
